alert.note: Alert for Pope (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 11:44AM CST until March 09 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Smithland Dam, Paducah, Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .With dry weather expected this week, crests on the Ohio River from Smithland to Cairo are forecast from Wednesday into Thursday. For the Ohio River...including Smithland Dam, Paducah, Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY, MARCH 09... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Smithland Dam. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, March 09. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 43.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 44.0 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday, March 09. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
